title: 香港網絡新聞工作者聯盟記者會採訪邀請

replies.msg:
採訪通知

各大傳媒機構、採訪主任、記者、編輯：

就警方修改《警察通例》傳媒定義一事，我們一眾網媒記者將向香港政府、社會大眾及同業作出回應，聲明記者採訪合情合法合理，反對一切阻礙新聞自由的措施，並將堅持繼續進行採訪。現聯同立法會議員毛孟靜召開記者招待會，現誠邀貴 機構派員採訪，詳情如下：

日期：2020年9月27日
時間：15:00
地點：立法會綜合大樓506室

記者會將設有答問環節，誠邀出席。

香港網絡新聞工作者聯盟
2020年9月26日

Interview notice

To all major media organizations, interview directors, reporters, and editors:

Regarding the police's revision of the definition of media in the "Police General Orders", we are a group of online media reporters who wish to respond to the Hong Kong government, the general public, and the industry: Our field coverage and reporting is rational, legal, and reasonable. We oppose all measures that hinder press freedom and we will continue to proceed with our work no matter the circumstances. We will be holding a press conference along with member of Legislative Council Ms. Claudia Mo Man-ching and sincerely invite your organization to attend. The details are as follows:

Date: September 27th 2020 (Sunday)

Time: 3:00pm

Location: Room 506, Legislative Council Building

We welcome all questions during the Q&A session at the latter half of press conference.

The Alliance of Hong Kong Online Media Practitioners
September 26th 2020

https://www.facebook.com/2406628919558580/posts/2797467783808023/?d=n
